author: BenHeisenbergPS2
body:
I want this to have an impact on ENPH's ability to do business in the short term so they have an actual drop, I want to get more of their shares but so does everybody else lol.  Other than that, couple partners of theirs and a few other various ones, anything that's not ENPH I just want to diversify across the renewable energy sector.

If JKS somehow drops again (doubt it), buying more of them to wait for China to get around to realizing clean air is nice.

Also your username is kinda freaking me out lol
